testcase.purpose: To check if the remove of transition properties can work properly

step.step_desc: Removes the transition properties while the transition is running, then adds them back in.
step.expected: Transitions should start from the beginning

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transitions Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: To check if changes transition-duration while the transition is running to ensure that the running transition is not affected

step.step_desc: Changes transition-duration while the transition is running
step.expected: The running transition is not affected
